Sentencas: High temperature impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes deposited on polished yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) pellets were demonstrated using a newly designed controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope (CAHT-SPM).
Titulo: Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope

Sentencas: Probes based on Pt0.8Ir0.2 were fabricated and employed in all the investigations.
Titulo: Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the Au microelectrodes were investigated using CAHT-SPM at various temperatures in air.
Titulo: Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope

Sentencas: The influences of the tip-sample force and of the size of the microelectrode on the electrical properties of the Au microelectrodes were also studied.
Titulo: Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope

Sentencas: The impedance spectra of circular Au microelectrodes down to 8 urn in diameter at different temperatures were successfully obtained.
Titulo: Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope

Sentencas: The CAHT-SPM presented in this paper is capable of obtaining topography images, conductivity images and impedance spectra in-situ in a temperature range from room temperature to at least 650 degrees C. (C) 2011
Titulo: Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope
Impedance measurements on Au microelectrodes using controlled atmosphere high temperature scanning probe microscope
